folder_usable_characters.description: Folder names shall only use single-byte alphanumeric characters (a-z, A-Z, 0-9) and single-byte underscore (_). Line breaks, spaces, double-byte characters, and control characters are prohibited.

folder_no_numbers_at_start.description: Folder name shall not begin with a number.

folder_no_underscore_at_start.description: Folder name shall not begin with an underscore.

folder_no_underscore_at_end.description: Folder name shall not end with an underscore.

no_consecutive_underscores.description: File name shall not contain consecutive underscores.

folder_not_reserved_matlab_word.description: Folder name shall not consist solely of a single reserved MATLAB keyword.

folder_max_name_length.description: Folder name length shall be a maximum of 63 characters.
